channel.title: Issues on France Grilles Cloud Status

item.title: IPHC Maintenance
item.description: Description: The SCIGNE platform will be down from the 27th of July until the 29 of July, due to a scheduled power outage.
item.content: Description: The SCIGNE platform will be down from the 27th of July until the 29 of July, due to a scheduled power outage.

item.title: CC-IN2P3 Maintenance
item.description: Description - Migration of the GPFS plaftorm to CEPH. It may have some impact on the OpenStack Cloud Compute service.
item.content: Description - Migration of the GPFS plaftorm to CEPH. It may have some impact on the OpenStack Cloud Compute service.
